sections.heading: occasion, defined.Bingo occasion shall mean a single gathering or session at which a bingo game or series of successive bingo games are played

sections.text:
9-205.Bingo occasion, defined.

Bingo occasion shall mean a single gathering or session at which a bingo game or series of successive bingo games are played.

SourceLaws 1978, LB 351, § 5;Laws 1984, LB 949, § 4;R.S.Supp.,1984, § 9-128;Laws 1986, LB 1027, § 6.
